product_idea.title: 404: Social Life Not Found
product_idea.description: A minimalist white tee featuring a browser-style error page that reads '404: Social Life Not Found' with a tiny stick-figure programmer hunched over a laptop, surrounded by empty coffee cups and pizza boxes. Underneath, a button says 'Retry in 5 years...' in classic hyperlink blue.

mockup_data.caption: A funny t-shirt mockup generated automatically
